sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Youth Sports Concussion Safety Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Youth Sports Concussion Safety Act.

sections.heading: Scope of Act.  This Act applies to any sponsored youth sports activity sponsored or sanctioned by a youth sports league
sections.text: This Act does not apply to an interscholastic athletic activity as that term is defined in Section 22-80 of the School Code. This Act applies to sponsored youth sports activitie

sections.heading: Concussion and head injury educational materials
sections.text: Each youth sports league with players who participate in any youth-sponsored sports activity sponsored or sanctioned by the youth sports league is encouraged to make available, electronically or in writing, to coaches, game officials, and players, as

sections.heading: The School Code is amended by repealing Sections 10-20.54 and 34-18.46.
sections.text: The School Code is amended by repealing Sections 10-20.54 and 34-18.46.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
